text: This is the list of lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender (LGBT) firsts by year *1998 **In 1998 was the first time that an openly transgender person won the Eurovision Song Contest. *2009 **In 2009 [American] daytime TV's first lesbian wedding, was shown. *2012 **the first Jamaican artist to publicly come out; She did so on 28 June 2012; She wrote "Yes I am a Lesbian" ,to her fans from her official Facebook web page. ==References== Category:LGBT
title: List of LGBT firsts by year
